entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
